page.title: 11A Week in the Life of Me!
page.content: At home I help my Mum in the living r om and in the kitchen and the dining room. I also watch the television and I also watch cartoons.I help my Mum hoover and tidy the house and some- times help to cook.I lay the table and wash the dishes.We live in a semi- detached house.My mum's room and my sister's room is very big but my room is small.My best hobbies are collecting rubbers and stickers and I also like reading.I go to Guides every Wednesday at Quinton.Sometimes we have weekend camps at Preston Deanery.I like to go swimming every Tuesday at Roade.I can swim 300m and my favourite stroke is the breast stroke.I have got a hamster and his name is Snuggles.The hamster has plenty of exercise on his wheel. Snuggles is a tan-colour and she likes to eat nuts. Gilian Walton,11 yrs.
